p: Similarly, the report of endotracheal intubation was associated to greater risk for patients with any NCD (OR1.95). The NCD posing greatest risk was diabetes (OR 1.68) followed by immunosuppression (OR 1.32). Asthma was found to be a protective factor of endotracheal intubation (OR 0.73). The modifiable risk factor of obesity increased the risk of intubation by 1.62 times, but no significant association was found with smoking.
